function.name: mopDrying_start
function.description: This function is used to start the mop drying function of the robot vacuum cleaner.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to start the mop drying function.

Type.description: The type of the device to start the mop drying function.
